text: Grace!
Come inside the house; it's time for bed.

3.name: Grace
text: But Mozes, I don't wanna! I'm not sleepy yet.

4.name: Mozes
text: Grace, I know, but it's getting dark soon. You need to come inside.

5.name: Grace
text: Aw, man! Mommy and daddy always let me stay outside after dark!

6.name: Mozes
text: Heh, that's not entirely true. But come now, you must listen to me.

8.name: Grace
text: Okay...

1.name: Mozes
text: I'm sorry, Grace, but after our parents were killed, you know it's not safe here in the village after dark. Orcs sometimes enter the village, and I don't want to lose you too.

2.name: Grace
text: Boohoo! I miss mommy and daddy!

3.name: Mozes
text: Me too, Grace, me too.

4.name: Mozes
text: Anyway, it's not just getting dark; it's also past your bedtime. So, goodnight and sweet dreams.

5.name: Grace
text: But I really wanna play outside! I'm not afraid of the dark.

6.name: Mozes
text: Tomorrow, when it's safe, you can play outside again.

7.name: Grace
text: But...

8.name: Mozes
text: No more 'buts'. It's time to sleep now.

9.name: Mozes
text: I love you. Sleep tight.

10.name: Grace
text: Love you too.
Good morning, Grace. Did you sleep well?
Grace?
Grace, where are you?
Is she gone? She should know better than to leave without telling me.
I hope she didn't run off again! It's still dangerous outside the village!
Oh no! I need to make sure! She likes to go to Honeywood Forest in the north.
There could be orcs there! I'll get my sword, just in case.
What was that loud noise?
Dang! That's just great.
Umph! I can't move it out of the way. Now I can't return.
Alright, first things first. I need to find Grace before dark.
It's 07:30 now, that gives me about 12 hours to find her.
I don't think that's gonna be a problem.
